caption.p: (A) Brain magnetic resonance venography (MRV) showed that venous thrombosis of bilateral transverse sinus, sigmoid sinus, and superior sagittal sinus in June 14, 2016. (B) Digital subtraction angiography (DSA) showed that venous thrombosis of right transverse sinus, sigmoid sinus, and superior sagittal sinus before catheter-directed endovascular thrombolysis in September 1, 2016. (C) Brain MRV showed that venous thrombosis of superior sagittal sinus, transverse sinus, and sigmoid sinus was improved significantly after catheter-directed endovascular thrombolysis.
